title: Asynchronously Parallel Optimization Method For Sizing Analog Transistors U
excerpt: A new technical paper titled “APOSTLE: Asynchronously Parallel Optimization for Sizing Analog Transistors Using DNN Learning” was published by researchers at UT Austin and Analog Devices. Abstract “Analog circuit sizing is a high-cost process in terms of the manual effort invested and the computation time spent. title: Another Firing Among Google’s A.I. Brain Trust, and More Discord (Published 2022)
excerpt: The researchers are considered a key to the company’s future. But they have had a hard time shaking infighting and controversy over a variety of issues.
